org.quickstart.rcp.perspective

Class AFXPerspective

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.quickstart.rcp.component.AComponent
      • org.quickstart.rcp.perspective.AFXPerspective
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<org.quickstart.api.component.Component<javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.event.Event>,java.lang.Object>>, javafx.fxml.Initializable, org.quickstart.api.component.Component<javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.event.Event>,java.lang.Object>, org.quickstart.api.component.Declarative, org.quickstart.api.component.Perspective<javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.event.Event>,javafx.event.Event,java.lang.Object>, org.quickstart.api.component.PerspectiveView<javafx.scene.Node,javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.event.Event>,javafx.event.Event,java.lang.Object>, org.quickstart.api.component.RootComponent<org.quickstart.api.component.SubComponent<javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.event.Event>,javafx.event.Event,java.lang.Object>,org.quickstart.api.message.Message<javafx.event.Event,java.lang.Object>>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EmbeddedFXPerspective

    public abstract class AFXPerspective
extends AComponent
implements org.jacpfx.api.component.PerspectiveView<javafx.scene.Node,javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.event.Event>,javafx.event.Event,java.lang.Object>, javafx.fxml.Initializable
    represents a basic javafx2 perspective that handles subcomponents, perspectives are not handled in thread so avoid long running tasks in perspectives.
    Author:
    Andy Moncsek
